content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: yellow_terracotta
inventory=[{"type": "orange_wool", "quantity": 46, "index": 12}, {"type": "sunflower", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "activator_rail", "quantity": 60, "index": 19}, {"type": "lime_concrete_powder", "quantity": 12, "index": 23}, {"type": "strider_spawn_egg", "quantity": 15, "index": 32}, {"type": "grass_path", "quantity": 49, "index": 34}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 8, "index": 36}, {"type": "diamond_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "diamond", "quantity": 32, "index": 38}, {"type": "gold_block", "quantity": 16, "index": 44}]

thought: To craft yellow_terracotta, I need to craft yellow_dye first. To craft yellow_dye, I need to place a sunflower in the crafting grid. The sunflower is in slot 17, so I will move it to slot 1 in the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 17 to slot 1 with quantity 1
